function.name: type_character
function.description: Print the given character. Accepts only a single character, like type_writer(letter='@')

character.description: Print the given character. Accepts only a single character, like type_character(character='@')

function.name: type_letter
function.description: Print the given letter. Accepts only a single letter, like type_writer(letter='a')

letter.description: Print the given letter. Accepts only a single letter, like type_writer(letter='a')
